data.title: Here Are All the Celebrities Who Have Attended Taylor Swiftâ€™s The Eras Tour
data.meta_description: Taylor Swift has plenty of famous pals that have been supporting her on her massive The Eras tour.
data.text:
Emma Stone

The La La Land actress was just as much of a Swiftie as the rest of the Glendale crowd when she was spotted belting her heart out to the Fearless hit, â€œLove Story.â€

ChloÃ« Grace Moretz

Like Stone, Moretz was loving the â€œLove Storyâ€ part of the show in Las Vegas.

Emma Watson

The Harry Potter star was seen having the time of her life with Este Haim, dancing during the Vegas tour stop.

Diplo

â€œI kinda know the lyrics,â€ the DJ wrote on his Instagram Stories while dancing along to â€œAnti-Heroâ€ in Las Vegas. He also confirmed that heâ€™s a â€œmotherfâ€”ing Swiftie now.â€

Shania Twain

Shania Twain is all about the girl power, and the â€œMan! I Feel Like a Woman!â€ superstar had the time of her life dancing to the 1989 single â€œBlank Spaceâ€ in Vegas. â€œWhat a show,â€ she wrote on Instagram.

Emma Roberts

Yes, yet another Emma was at The Erasâ€™ Vegas stop, as she was spotted taking videos and dancing with sunglasses on to the tune of â€œStyle.â€

Watch here.

Ellen Pompeo

Another â€œBlank Spaceâ€ fan is Ellen Pompeoâ€™s daughter Sienna, who starred in her motherâ€™s Instagram Stories singing along to the track in Las Vegas.

Selena Gomez

Swiftâ€™s longtime friend showed up for her at the April 1 show in Arlington, Texas. Selena and her little sister Gracie each dressed up as a Taylor Swift era â€” Folklore and Speak Now, respectively â€” and Gomez was spotted screaming along to â€œCruel Summer.â€

Jack Antonoff

Swiftâ€™s prolific producer pal Antonoff also made it to see the star in Arlington on April 1. â€œholy shit,â€ he captioned an Instagram Stories video taken during the emotional stage production of â€œAugust,â€ a Folklore favorite that he co-wrote and co-produced. Swift also took a special request from Antonoff that night: â€œDeath By a Thousand Cuts,â€ which was one of the surprise songs on her set list.

J.J. Watt

Former Arizona Cardinals defensive end J.J. Watt took to Instagram to rave about his experience at opening night of The Eras tour. â€œSo much respect @taylorswift,â€ he captioned a video sharing his thoughts about the concert. â€œWhen your fans pay for a ticket, they are getting their moneyâ€™s worth and some.â€

Danica Patrick

â€œWe were all so in the moment that we didnâ€™t take many pictures together and I didnâ€™t even take that many videos,â€ the former race car driver wrote on Instagram. â€œ@taylorswift sang 44 songs and it was the most amazing concert I have ever seen. Swiftie for life.â€

Ethan Hawke

It was the ultimate crossover when Hawke was spotted chatting with Selena Gomez at the Arlington, Texas, tour stop.

Aaron Dessner

Aaron Dessner enjoyed the first of Swiftâ€™s three Tampa concerts from the audience, and then joined her on the stage two nights in a row for the live debut of two songs. On April 14, they performed â€œThe Great Warâ€ together. On April 15, they had a special moment at the piano for â€œMad Woman.â€

Billy Joel

Billy Joel and his family seemed to have a blast seeing Swift live. â€œRockinâ€™ into our new â€˜eraâ€™ thank you @Taylorswift we loved the show!â€ he wrote on Instagram, where he shared photos from the concert and a video clip of his young daughters dancing around to â€œâ€¦Ready for It?â€

Joseph Kahn

Grammy Award-winning director Joseph Kahn happily checked in via Instagram Stories from a VIP tent at the April 21 Eras Tour stop in Houston. After the show he wrote, â€œIrrespective of our friendship, this is my honest opinion: @taylorswift is putting on the show of a lifetime with the Eras Tour. Itâ€™s as big, bold, and artistic as any of the great pop stars of history. Itâ€™s fueled by her imagination and her soul. Itâ€™s stunning and beautiful.â€ Kahn worked on a number of music videos with Swift: â€œBlank Space,â€ â€œBad Blood,â€ â€œWildest Dreams,â€ â€œOut of the Woods,â€ â€œLook What You Made Me Do,â€ â€œâ€¦Ready for It?â€, â€œEnd Gameâ€ and â€œDelicate.â€

Matty Healy

Matty Healy was spotted at Swiftâ€˜s concert in Nashville on Friday (May 5), sparking further speculation that the two music stars are romantically involved.

Earlier in the week, rumors surfaced that the The 1975 frontman and pop superstar are â€œmassively proud and excited about this relationship,â€ according to a source cited by The Sun. The report followed news of Swiftâ€™s split from her longtime boyfriend Joe Alwyn in early April.

At the show, during her performance of â€œCardigan,â€ fans were quick to notice Swift mouthing the same words to that Healy was filmed saying before The 1975â€™s performance of â€œAbout Youâ€ in Manila on May 3.

â€œThis one is about you. You know who you are. I love you,â€ they both mouthed to the crowd on the separate occasions.

Mariska Hargitay

After sharing some photo memories with Swift from tours past via an Instagram Story earlier in the day, the Law & Order star was spotted on the floor at Nissan Stadium in Nashville at the May 6 show of The Eras Tour.

She returned for more on May 26! Hargitay attended one of Swiftâ€™s New Jersey shows and posted a video about her experience on Instagram the next day. â€œIâ€™m sitting here basking in the glow of last night, Taylorâ€™s concert, which was so amazing. I canâ€™t even get over that woman. Three-and-a-half hours of pure magic,â€ she gushed. She also showed off a little collection of gifts she received from Swifties: â€œ50 of these friendship bracelets from last night. I wanted to say thank you to everyone who gave me their friendship bracelets. It was so sweet.â€

Reese Witherspoon

â€œWhat a night to remember!â€ Witherspoon gushed on Instagram after Swiftâ€™s May 6 concert in Nashville. â€œ@taylorswift in front of 70,000 incredible fans.â€

â€œThe stellar song choices, inspired choreography, other-worldly art design â€¦ an incredible night to dance, sing and feel so much JOY .. thank you @taylorswift and the whole ERAS tour team for shining so bright tonight.â€

Witherspoon shared a clip from the Midnights era of the show, with Swift performing â€œBejeweled.â€

Sabrina Carpenter

Sabrina Carpenter was overcome with emotion during Swiftâ€™s concert at Philadelphiaâ€™s Lincoln Financial Field on May 12. The singer and actress took to her Instagram Story to share a tearful moment while watching the show. â€œdonâ€™t hmu,â€ Carpenter captioned the clip. â€œunless you are HER,â€ she added to a follow-up post of Swift performing.

Candice King

Former The Vampire Diaries star Candice King was among the Swifties who attended the rain-delayed show in Nashville on May 7. â€œA Four hour weather delay (and every canned cocktail we brought in our to go coolerâ€¦ and then maybe some of the canned cocktails our driver surprised us with) laterâ€¦ and the show went on!â€ the actress captioned a carousel of photos and videos on her Instagram account. â€œSo much running, so much dancing, and even more singing all in the warm spring midnight rain.â€

Jennifer Lawrence

It was quite a crowd that surrounded Jennifer Lawrence once she was spotted at the VIP tent at Philadelphiaâ€™s Sunday night (May 14) show. The actress took the time to interact with fans, even attempting to take group photos while staying on her side of the barricade.

Keith Urban & Nicole Kidman

Keith Urban and Nicole Kidman showed up to night three in Philly, leaving fans wondering whether the couple was just there to see the show, or whether Urban â€” who was also seen taking selfies with Swifties â€” might join Swift onstage for their vault track â€œThatâ€™s When.â€

Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello

After sharing a passionate kiss at Coachella in April 2023, Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello were spotted together at Swiftâ€™s concert in East Rutherford, N.J., on May 26.

In fan-captured photographs taken at MetLife Stadium, the â€œStitchesâ€ singer, 24, and â€œHavanaâ€ songstress, 26, were seeing enjoying a night out during the first of three sold-out shows at the massive N.J. venue. A video circulating on social media sees the pair strolling to their seats in the VIP section, Mendes rocking a sleeveless white shirt and blue jeans and Cabello sporting a black halter top and colorful skirt.

Check out the fan-captured photos and videos on Twitter below.

Lin-Manuel Miranda

The Hamilton creator was spotted in the VIP tent on May 26 at MetLife Stadium in New Jersey, posing with Molly Ringwald and Mariska Hargitay, and checked in from the show on Instagram later on, quoting one of Swiftâ€™s Midnights songs. â€œâ€¦what if I told you Iâ€™m a mastermind (@taylorswift ftw, what an incredible show),â€ he wrote.

Maren Morris

The country star also posted clips from the May 26 concert at MetLife from the moments that Swift performed â€œYou Belong With Meâ€ (Morris joked, â€œSheâ€™s gonna be huge someday!â€ and â€œWe Are Never Ever Getting Back Togetherâ€ (with Morris giving the camera the middle finger).

Miles and Keleigh Teller

Top Gun: Maverick star Miles Teller and his wife, Keleigh, were spotted at Swiftâ€™s concert at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J., on May 27. The couple attended the sold-out show with New York Jets quarterback Aaron Rodgers, who was spotted dancing up a storm during the pop superstarâ€™s performance of her 1989 hit â€œStyle.â€ Minutes before Swift hit the stage, Rodgers captured the Tellers in a video on his Instagram Story, captioning the post, â€œTaylor Time.â€

Fletcher

Fletcher tweeted after Swiftâ€™s May 28 show at MetLife Stadium that â€œsinging â€˜cleanâ€™ with a stadium full of people at the top of your lungs in New York while deep in your feelings hits different. thank you taylor.â€

An Instagram Story video of Swift performing â€œCleanâ€ at the piano â€” it was one of her surprise songs of the night â€” was captioned: â€œan artist for the ages. blown away.â€

Paul Rudd

Fans spotted actor Paul Rudd at Swiftâ€™s MetLife Stadium show in New Jersey on May 28. One fan photo shows him accepting a friendship bracelet, and another shows off the â€œ13â€ he has written on his hand for the special occasion.

Bradley Cooper

Add Bradley Cooper to the list of famous names to catch one of Swiftâ€™s celeb-stacked New Jersey shows. The snapshot below was captured by a fan on May 28.

Drew Barrymore

The Drew Barrymore Show talk show host raved about Swiftâ€™s show after attending the final of three Eras Tour stops in East Rutherford. â€œI LOVE YOU TAYLOR SWIFT!!!!!!!!â€ she posted on Instagram, sharing photos from the night. â€œYou are the role model all of us girls and women need. Thank you for one of the best nights of our lives. We are so lucky to have seen your showâ€¦ You transcend. And make life beautiful. Everyone passing beaded bracelets around. Witnessing the good.â€

Julia Roberts

The Oscar winner had high praise for Swift after attending one of the concerts. â€œ@Taylor Swift I Love You. Thank you for being EVERYTHING WE EVER NEEDED!â€ the actress captioned a June 5 photo of the pop star on Instagram.

Flavor Flav

Flavor Flav had the time of his life during Swiftâ€™s Eras Tour stop at Detroitâ€™s Ford Field on June 9, 2023. During the show, the Public Enemy co-founder documented his enjoyable experience on social media with fellow fans. â€œTHANKX to all my new friends,,, luv my fellow Swifties,â€ the iconic clock-wearing MC tweeted alongside a video of himself rocking an all-red outfit.

Flav would latter attend Swiftâ€™s show in Hamburg, Germany on July 23, 2024, during which the pop star would give him a sweet shoutout from the stage. â€œShout out back to @taylorswift13 @taylornation13 and her team and family for having me,!!! ğŸ«¶ğŸ¾ğŸ«¶ğŸ¾ğŸ«¶ğŸ¾â€ the rapper tweeted afterward.

David Harbour

A fan snapped a pre-show picture with the Stranger Things star by the VIP tent at Swiftâ€™s June 24 stop in Minneapolis.

Millie Bobby Brown & Jake Bongiovi

Brown â€” no doubt in her Lover era â€” and her fiancÃ© were photographed in the VIP tent at Swiftâ€™s Friday night (June 30) show in Cincinnati, Ohio.

Gigi Hadid

Gigi Hadid attended her bestieâ€™s concert at Leviâ€™s Stadium in Santa Clara, Calif., on July 28. The model took to her Instagram Story to share moments from Eras Tour show, which she attended with make-up artist Patrick Ta. â€œThe most magical night,â€ she captioned a photo of the pair showing off their collection of Eras Tour friendship bracelets. Hadid also participated in some backstage shenanigans with Swift at the show. In a TikTok video shared by the pop superstar, Hadid is seen giggling on a golf cart as the songstress films her dad following them on a Segway.

Vanessa and Bianka Bryant

During Swiftâ€™s Aug. 3 show at L.A.â€™s SoFi Stadium, Kobe Bryantâ€™s daughter Bianka came to the front of the stage while mom Vanessa watched. The superstar then gave her black hat from the Red era of her show to the little girl, and hugged her.

Mindy Kaling

The star showed off some of her friendship bracelets in an Instagram Stories ahead of the show on Aug. 3. â€œNGL this was challenging for me,â€ she wrote over the photo. Later, a friend shared a snap of the actress wearing a 1989 T-shirt at the show.

Jesse Tyler Ferguson, Justin Mikita, Hayley Kiyoko, Molly Shannon & Becca Tilley

Ahead of the Aug. 3 show, the Modern Family star shared a photo of the friendship bracelets he made. â€œJustin told me I have to make these for the @taylorswift #erastour tonight. I am 47 years old but I donâ€™t want to be underprepared,â€ he captioned his Instagram post. The next morning, the actor shared a series of photos of himself and his husband enjoying the concert, including a group shot with Hayley Kiyoko, Molly Shannon and Becca Tilley.

Brie Larson, Sarah Paulson & Lupita Nyong'o

The Captain Marvel star attended the Aug. 3 show at SoFi Stadium. She shared a series of Instagram Stories from the concert, kicking off with a photo of the countdown clock and captioning it, â€œBefore we lost our minds.â€

In a subsequent video on Stories, she traded and showed off friendship bracelets with Paulson and Nyongâ€™o.

Tanya Rad

The author, who co-hosts On Air With Ryan Seacrest, was in attendance at the Aug. 3 show with boyfriend Roby. She shared an Instagram photo of them together at the show, and captioned it, â€œHeâ€™s my most favorite era â¤ï¸ğŸ¦‹â˜ºï¸ğŸ˜« *my invisible string.â€ In the snap, the couple is wearing matching white T-shirts with a red heart, with the two connected by a piece of white string.

Ashley Tisdale

The actress attended Swiftâ€™s Aug. 3 show at SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles. â€œLast night was UNREAL! @taylorswift The Eras tour â¤ï¸â€ she wrote on Instagram later, showing off photos and videos from the concert.

Paul Stanley

The Kiss co-founder was in attendance at the Aug. 4 show in Los Angeles with his family. â€œTook Erin, Sarah and Emily to see Taylor Swift Last Night!â€ Stanley tweeted. â€œ6 shows at SoFi Stadium for a total of A HALF MILLION PEOPLE and I know whyâ€¦ PHENOMENAL SHOW BY A PHENOMENAL ARTIST. Thanks to her staff for rolling out the red carpet for us.â€

Max Greenfield & Hunter Schafer

New Girlâ€˜s Greenfield and Euphoriaâ€˜s Schafer took a selfie together at The Eras Tour, which Greenfield shared in a slideshow of concert photos the day after Swiftâ€™s Aug. 4 show in L.A. Also seen in Greenfieldâ€™s concert pic collection: a video clip of the bridge of â€œCruel Summerâ€ live and a whole lot of friendship bracelets, including one referencing the New Girl episode â€œElaineâ€™s Big Day,â€ captioned with â€œThank you to whoever gave this to me last night I feel seenâ€ in an Instagram Story. â€œBest Night of My Life,â€ he captioned a snapshot of all his new bracelets.

Kesha

Kesha showed up at the Aug. 4 show at SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles. â€œCheers to the queen,â€ the singer wrote on her Instagram Story. She also shared a short video clip of riding in a cart through the backstage area.

Paula Abdul, Scheana Shay, James Kennedy & Ally Lewber

Vanderpump Rules stars Scheana, James and Ally took in the Aug. 4 show at SoFi Stadium in L.A. The DJ shared a photo of himself on Instagram kissing girlfriend Ally ahead of the show. Scheana shared photos of herself with her costars and other friends getting ready and having fun at the show on Instagram Stories.

The Bravo hitâ€™s cast members were also spotted posing with Paula Abdul.

Jessica Alba

The actress made the Aug. 4 Eras Tour show a family affair, attending with daughters Honor and Haven, son Hayes and husband Cash Warren. â€œ@taylorswift with the fam â€“ what a show! ğŸ’«ğŸ’˜ğŸ‘ğŸ½ğŸ’ƒğŸ½ğŸª©ğŸ¶ #ErasTour,â€ she captioned an Instagram carousel of her clan at the concert.

Gayle King, Channing Tatum & Karamo Brown

CBS Mornings host Gayle King attended the Aug. 5 show at SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles. She spotted Channing Tatum in a homemade â€œItâ€™s me, hi, Iâ€™m the daddy itâ€™s meâ€ shirt showing off his dance moves, as well as fellow TV host Karamo Brown. â€œSaturday night! @taylorswift in LA w/fav daughter @kirbybump! Our 4th Taylor concert together over the years & she has taken things to another level! A round of applause to @channingtatum & @karomobrown who went all in!â€ she captioned her Instagram carousel.

Alicia Keys

The Grammy-winning showed off backstage pictures and videos of her 8-year-old son Genesis getting the sweetest greetings from Swift backstage at the Eras Tour at SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles. â€œBig love to @taylorswift for your big beautiful spirit that makes everyone feel loved!â€ Keys captioned her Instagram post.

Tiffany Haddish, Cameron Diaz, Zoe Saldana

It was girlsâ€™ night at Swiftâ€™s Los Angeles tour stops, as all three superstars posed for photos together before enjoying the show.

Kevin Costner

The Yellowstone star was seen at Los Angelesâ€™ SoFi Stadium watching the show with his 13-year-old daughter Grace Avery, as shown in photos published by TMZ.

Meghan Markle

The Duchess of Sussex was spotted rocking out to â€œYou Belong With Meâ€ with her friend Lucy Fraser, as seen in photos posted by Page Six.

Charlize Theron

The actress celebrated her birthday with her daughters at the Eras tour in Los Angeles, writing on Instagram, â€œThank you for the best birthday ever, @taylorswift!!! We had such a great fâ€”ing time.â€

Selena Gomez

Gomez supported her bestie once again at the SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles, and took to her Instagram Story to share a sweet video singing along to Swiftâ€™s track â€œLoverâ€ as she hugged her sister Gracie.

Austin Butler & Kaia Gerber

The Elvis star and the model were seen cuddling up at Swiftâ€™s LA tour stop.

Mariska Hargitay

The Law & Order: SVU star was â€œstill in the afterglow of the most magical nightâ€ in Los Angeles, sharing a sweet selfie to Instagram.

Jeff Goldblum

The actor shared a sweet photo smiling with his wife, Emilie, at Tuesdayâ€™s (Aug. 8) Los Angeles show. â€œFever dream high in the quiet of the night, you know that I caught it,â€ he captioned the post, referencing lyrics from â€œCruel Summer.â€

Karlie Kloss

The model was seen dancing to â€œShake It Offâ€ in the crowd during Wednesday nightâ€™s (Aug. 9) show.

Halsey

Halsey got in on the friendship bracelets trend, making a whopping 50 beaded creations, which she shared on her Instagram Stories.

Sadie Sink & Anya Taylor-Joy

The actresses were seen enjoying the show while sitting next to each other.

Jessica Chastain

The Oscar-winning actress attended one of the pop superstarâ€™s shows at Mexico Cityâ€™s Foro Sol. Chastain shared a carousel of photos and videos of herself at the show, including a snap of her with Swift backstage. â€œSpamming u w really good @taylorswift Eras Tour content ğŸ¥°,â€ she captioned the post.

Danielle Fishel

The former Boy Meets World star attended one of Swiftâ€™s shows at Foro Sol in Mexico City, where she reunited with Girl Meets World star and Eras Tour opener Sabrina Carpenter.

RosÃ©

The BLACKPINK singer attended Swiftâ€™s first Eras Tour show in Tokyo on Feb. 7, 2024, and proved herself to be a Swiftie. In a five-minute video she shared on TikTok, RosÃ© sings passionately along to the 10-minute version of â€œAll Too Well.â€

â€œBest 10 minutes in tokyo,â€ she captioned the clip.

Travis Kelce

The Chiefs tight end attended his girlfriendâ€™s first show of the Eras Tour in Australia on Friday, Feb. 23, at Accor Stadium, and rocked a bunch of friendship bracelets on both wrists.

Katy Perry & Rita Ora

The â€œFireworkâ€ singer attended the Feb. 23 show at Accor Stadium in Sydney, Australia, alongside Rita Ora. Perry was spotted singing and dancing along to â€œBad Blood,â€ and after the show, posted a selfie with Swift as well as clips from the concert on Instagram. â€œGot to see an old friend shine tonight,â€ she captioned the post.

Baz Luhrmann

The famed Australian director was spotted next to NFL star Travis Kelce at Swiftâ€™s first show of The Eras Tour in Sydney on Friday, Feb. 23, 2024. As the Chiefs tight end rallied the crowd, the critically acclaimed director helped hype up Swifties in the vicinity.

Mark Hoppus & Tom DeLonge

The Blink-182â€˜s Mark Hoppus attended Swiftâ€™s first show of The Eras Tour in Sydney on Friday, Feb. 23, 2024. â€œYou need to calm down,â€ he captioned a backstage selfie on Instagram with the pop superstar and his wife. DeLonge, meanwhile, was spotted in a snapshot with Australian actress Rebel Wilson on the second night of Swiftâ€™s Eras stop in Sydney. Blink-182 was playing its own show nearby at the Qudos Bank Arena on Friday and Saturday night.

Rebel Wilson

The Australian actress attended Swiftâ€™s second show of The Eras Tour in Sydney on Saturday, Feb. 24, 2024. â€œ@taylorswift really does have the most amazing fans! Thank you for all the bracelets and the love you show everyone!â€ Wilson wrote on Instagram alongside snapshots from the show, including pics with Sabrina Carpenter and Blink-182â€˜s Tom DeLonge. â€œIt made tonight such an amazing experience not only for me and my friends but for my 8 year old niece who was just so excited to have Taylor be her first ever concert!â€

BLACKPINK's Lisa

The K-pop star attended Swiftâ€™s March 3 show in Singapore and afterward, shared a series of photos to Instagram, including two which showed the two global stars together backstage. â€œHad such a blast at The Eras Tour! Amazing performanceğŸ’˜@taylorswift,â€ Lisa captioned her post.

Barry Keoghan

The Saltburn star, who is rumored to be dating Eras Tour opener Sabrina Carpenter, attended the March 3 show at Singaporeâ€™s National Stadium. A video circulating on social media shows the actor watching as Carpenter sings her hit â€œNonsense.â€

Travis Kelce, Bradley Cooper, Gigi Hadid & Lenny Kravitz

The pop superstar had a whole lot of star support at her fourth show at the Paris La Defense Arena on Sunday, May 13. Fans spotted not only the Kansas City Chiefâ€™s tight end grooving to her tunes, but also Hadid dancing along next to the Oscar-nominated actor. Swifties also saw Grammy winner Kravitz taking video in the stands near the NFL star.

Blake Lively and Haim (Again)

One year after their first Eras Tour show, Lively and her daughters â€” James, Inez and Betty â€” attended Swiftâ€™s first of two concerts in Madrid. The It Ends With Us actress interacted with fans from her spot in the VIP floor section, which her family shared with the Haim sisters, and videos from the night captured Lively and her kids dancing along to â€œShake It Off.â€

Jason & Kylie Kelce

The former Philadelphia Eagles center and his wife were spotted by fans at night one of the London tour stops on June 21. In fan videos, Jason is seen signing an Eagles jersey and a hat, and exchanging friendship bracelets.

Prince William

Prince William and his children, Prince George and Princess Charlotte, snapped a couple of backstage selfies with Taylor Swift during the opening night (June 21) of her three-night stand at Wembley Stadium in London. The Prince of Wales was also celebrating his 42nd birthday at the show. â€œHappy Bday M8! London shows are off to a splendid start,â€ the pop star wrote on Instagram alongside the snapshot, which included her boyfriend Travis Kelce.

Tom Cruise, Hugh Grant, Greta Gerwig, Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis

The actors were all smiles at Swiftâ€™s second London show on June 22, singing and dancing along with Travis Kelce in a VIP tent on the stadium floor. Cruise was even photographed taking part in the tourâ€™s friendship bracelet trend with fans, while Grant later tweeted: â€œDear @taylorswift13, You have an incredible show, an amazing and v hospitable team and excellent if gigantic boyfriend.â€

Paul McCartney

It was a legendary night in London for fans who found themselves dancing to â€œBut Daddy I Love Himâ€ with Paul McCartney at Wembley Stadium on June 23. The Beatles icon was also spotted trading friendship bracelets.

Stevie Nicks

Stevie Nicks, who penned a poem â€œfor T â€” and meâ€¦â€ that appeared on the album art for physical copies of The Tortured Poets Department, was seen making her way through the crowd at Dublinâ€™s Aviva Stadium on Sunday, June 30. Currently on her own solo tour, the legendary Fleetwood Mac singer-songwriter wore a mask to stay healthy for fans who are awaiting her show; sheâ€™s next scheduled to play on July 3, in Dublin. Swift names Nicks on the second verse of Tortured Poets track â€œClara Bow,â€ singing: â€œYou look like Stevie Nicks/ In â€™75, the hair and lips/ Crowd goes wild at her fingertips/ Half moonshine, a full eclipse.â€ She debuted â€œClara Bowâ€ live at this show, with an introduction shouting out her â€œhero,â€ Nicks, of whom she said, â€œI could tell her any secret; sheâ€™d never tell anybody.â€

JWOWW & The Situation

Jersey Shore stars Jenni â€œJWOWWâ€ Farley and Mike â€œThe Situationâ€ Sorrentino had an adorable family outing in Milan, Italy, over the weekend to catch Taylor Swiftâ€™s Eras Tour show. The Situation was joined by his wife, Lauren â€” and the reality TV star commemorated the sweet coupleâ€™s night out with a social media photo, in which the duo is seen smiling from their seats at San Siro Stadium. â€œThe Situations are in the building #TaylorSwiftErasTourMilan,â€ he captioned the post.

Farley, meanwhile, treated her 10-year-old daughter Meilani to the ultimate birthday gift at the show. â€œThe swifties have arrived,â€ she captioned a group photo from dinner, in which her daughter is seen rocking a â€œ22â€ music video inspired outfit.
